chattimeline.name: Ian Brown
chattimeline.message: Ubuntu: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y gnupg software-properties-common curl curl -fsSL https://apt.releases.hashicorp.com/gpg | sudo apt-key add - sudo apt-add-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://apt.releases.hashicorp.com $(lsb_release -cs) main" sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install terraform Fedora: sudo dnf install -y dnf-plugins-core sudo dnf config-manager --add-repo https://rpm.releases.hashicorp.com/fedora/hashicorp.repo sudo dnf -y install terraform
